N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1001.2 - Requirements for approval

State Regulations
(a) The application must be complete and in
proper from. It shall provide all the information essential for the fund's
consideration. It shall contain a request for the fund's approval of the
application for guarantee of a loan. It shall be properly executed by one or
more authorized officers of the applicant. (b) The applicant must satisfactorily
demonstrate to the fund: (1)

That there is a
public need for the day care center in the territory which it proposes to
serve. (2)

If a nonprofit
corporation, that the members of the board of directors and the officers of the
corporation are of such character, experience, competence and standing as to
give reasonable assurance of their ability to conduct the affairs of the
corporation in its best interests and in the public interest; and further that
the members of the board of directors are representative of the community to be
served; and that no member of the board of directors is or shall be the
executive, administrator, or an employee of the corporation. (3)

That it will have adequate finances to
repay the principal and interest of the loan requested to be guaranteed and to
operate the proposed day care center. (c) The applicant must submit with the
application: (1)
A certified copy of the
executed original corporate certificate and of any amendments thereto or a copy
certified by an attorney-at-law of the proposed corporate certificate or of
amendments thereto. (2)

The rules
and bylaws proposed to be used in the operation of the day care
center. Notes
